aircraft.description: Baseline VWV MiG-17F SFM; Stage 2 variants are local perturbations around the tuned FM5 configuration.

scaling_model.cx0: Multiply all Cx0 values in SFM_Data.aerodynamics.table_data by this factor.
scaling_model.polar: Multiply all B2 and B4 values in SFM_Data.aerodynamics.table_data by this factor.
scaling_model.pfor: Multiply all Pfor values in SFM_Data.engine.table_data by this factor.

variants.notes: Baseline tuned candidate based on the first sweep (equivalent to previous FM5_DRAG0.6_ALL). Used as the reference SFM.
Same Cx0 and engine drag as baseline, but 0.5x polar drag (B2/B4) to increase climb and sustained turn. Upper bound on lift-related performance.
Same Cx0 and engine drag as baseline, but 0.7x polar drag (B2/B4) to slightly reduce climb and sustained turn. Lower bound on lift-related performance.
Baseline drag with afterburner thrust increased by 5%. Used to measure sensitivity of service ceiling and high-altitude climb to AB thrust.
Baseline drag with afterburner thrust reduced by 5%. Lower AB bound for service ceiling and climb sensitivity tests.
